Blocked_Browser_Main_Text: Scan the QR code to view on your device:
Bluetooth_Audio_Sync_Error: Audio sync failed. Please try again later.
Bluetooth_Audio_Sync_Main_Text: Hold headphones near microphone on screen and press start. Audio will be muted during the sync process.
Bluetooth_Visibility_Main_Text: Pairing new headphones? Headphones must be in pairing mode.
Cancel_Download_Main_Text: Are you sure you want to cancel the download?
Connection_Assistant_Help_Text: Or press the power button below to open the quick menu
Connection_Assistant_QR_Code_1_Main_Text: Scan the QR code to connect to the screen via Wi-Fi {0}
Connection_Assistant_QR_Code_2_SOP1_Help: Press the power button below and select Wi-Fi to choose an available network
Connection_Assistant_QR_Code_2_SOP1_Main: Ensure your device and this screen are on the same Wi-Fi network to stream media
Connection_Assistant_QR_Code_2_SOP1_Scan: Scan the QR code to connect: {1}
Connection_Assistant_QR_Code_2_SOP2_Main: Scan the QR code to download the Bentley Entertainment Control app
Connection_Failed_Main_Text: Network connection could not be established
Connection_Failed_Password_Main_Text: Connection failed. Please check your password.
Crosslink_Host_Main_Text: A crosslink pairing process has been initiated Please wait..
Crosslink_Screen_Main_Text: Please select the side of the vehicle you would like to assign this screen
Delete_Device_Main_Text: Are you sure you want to delete this Bluetooth device?
Delete_Install_Main_Text: Are you sure you want to delete the software update?
Delete_Network_Main_Text: Are you sure you want to delete this network?
Download_Failed_Main_Text: Software download failed. Would you like to retry?
IVI_Delete_Confirm: Are you sure you want to delete %1? Note: audio output to car speakers will no longer be available.
IVI_Main_Text: Please select the screen name as the Bluetooth audio source on the infotainment system. Maximum volume is determined by the infotainment master volume.
IVI_Pairing_Failed: Pairing failed. Please try again later.
IVI_Sync_Error: An error has occurred. Unable to synchronise audio. Please try again later.
IVI_Sync_Main_Text: Select the screen name as the Bluetooth audio source on the infotainment system. Check the volume and reduce background noise. Press START when the system is ready.
Install_Active_Main_Text: Installing update %1% complete. Please ensure the vehicle is switched on until the update is completed. The system will restart once the install is complete.
Install_Available_Main_Text: Software install available. Would you like to install now? During the update the system will be inoperable.
Install_Delete_Main_Text: Do you want to install or delete the update? During the software update process the system will be inoperable
Install_Failed_Main_Text: Software install failed. Would you like to retry?
Max_Volume_Notification: Screen volume set to maximum. Increase your infotainment system volume.
Menu_Help_Crosslink: Select CROSSLINK to view content currently shown on the companion screen. Note: if selecting crosslink when audio sharing is active, audio and volume controls are unavailable.
Menu_Help_HDMI: Content can be played from a HDMI source when a compatible device is connected. Note: if no content is playing on the HDMI device when selected, the screen will appear blank.
Menu_Help_Input: Select INPUT to connect to a Wi-Fi network. This enables you to stream content through external providers or to establish a connection with your device to share content.
Menu_Help_Install: To install the screen, pull the collar on the mounting arm and push the screen into the seat until the seat holder clicks in place.
Menu_Help_Intro_SOP1: The Bentley Entertainment System allows you to view and hear content from your mobile device connected via Wi-Fi or from a compatible device connected through HDMI or USB.
Menu_Help_Intro_SOP2: The Bentley Entertainment System allows you to view and hear content from your mobile device connected via Wi-Fi or from a compatible device connected through HDMI.
Menu_Help_OTA: To discover new features and bug fixes, download the latest software from the settings menu.
Menu_Help_Output_SOP1: Select OUTPUT to connect Bluetooth headphones or press the audio sharing button to send audio output to the car speakers. Audio is also available through wired headphones.
Menu_Help_Output_SOP2: Select OUTPUT to connect Bluetooth headphones. Audio is also available through wired headphones.
Menu_Help_Removal: To remove the screen from the seat, pull the collar on the mounting arm towards the rear of the vehicle then pull the screen until it is clear of the seat..
Menu_Help_Secure: To ensure the screen has located correctly, pull gently to check that the screen holder is secure.
Menu_Help_Source: Select SOURCE to choose your desired content. You can view content from external providers by selecting the service from the list shown. The browser can also be reset in this menu.
Menu_Help_USB: Media can be played through a compatible device connected via USB when using the Bentley Entertainment Control app.
Notification_Initialising: The Bentley Entertainment System is initialising...
Notification_OTT_Unavailable: External content provider is currently unavailable
Notification_Temperature: Screen temperature too high. System will switch off soon to avoid being damaged.
PIN_Entry_Main_Text: Please enter the PIN for your Bluetooth device
Pairing_Failed_Wrong_PIN_Main_Text: Connection failed. Please check your PIN.
Reset_Browser_Main_Text: Are you sure you want to reset the browser? All account information will be lost and you will need to log in again.
Screen_Off_Notification: Please tap the screen to switch on
Shutting_Down_Notification: The Bentley Entertainment System is shutting down...
Software_Reset_Main_Text: By restoring the system, all settings will be reset. All personal data including saved networks, Bluetooth devices and passwords will be deleted. Are you sure you want to reset?
Software_Reset_Successful_Main_Text: Factory settings have been restored. System will restart shortly.
Update_Unavailable_Main_Text: Unable to check for updates. Please try again later.
Use_Extension_Main_Text_PL: The Bentley Entertainment System will shut down in %1 seconds. Press OK to extend use.
Use_Extension_Main_Text_SG: The Bentley Entertainment System will shut down in %1 second. Press OK to extend use.
